section.programlisting:
Introduction

This sample Wiki is used to test and show the various features of the Rich Text Editor in Qt.

See the TODO list for stuff which is still missing.

Sample Page

section.title: Generic
section.screen: $ grep pre * BrowserWidget.py: # Expand to and select the previous item EditorWidget.py:# # Reset previous list EditorWidget.py: if style in ['javacode', 'sqlcode', 'cppcode', 'pycode', 'xmlcode', 'pre']: EditorWidget.py: # Create a plain text representation of the selected blocks FormatManager.py: 'pre' : 'pre'}
